attributes.action: sort out the issues at langley green level crossings
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned want the government to address issues we have at Langley green railway station regards the level crossings in Sandwell

The crossings are  directly on a school run and often the barriers are down longer than necessary , through the barriers our bus service was disrupted and has had to been re routed to avoid being stuck at the barriers for up to half an hour at a time .
That caused many issues in the local area for the elderly that rely on public transport ,

We want network rail to consider the option of building a bridge or underpass so people can cross and don’t have to wait it would also make it safer for parents and children doing the school run .
We want the government to fund network rail to carry out the work to build the bridge or underpass whichever is decided suitable to enable these improvements to happen regards the railway safety barriers at that railway station in this financial year
